overview: Jack and Alyssa have a great relationship, except for all the parts that don't work. They're hoping that a roadtrip up the California coast with Alyssa's best friend Heather will bring them closer together. But when they stop at the beach to see dolphins, and meet Raidne, everything changes... Raidne is like no one any of them have met before, and even the very straight Heather finds herself enthralled.
title: Sorrow Bay
